title: Electric motor parts maker EuroGroup Laminations enters India, signs JV in China
description: Milan-based EuroGroup Laminations (EGLA) - which specialises in stators and rotors, two key components of electric motors and generators - supplies manufacturers in the automotive and wider industrial sectors.
